titleStmt.title: The Lamentation of the safe committee. Or, Fleetwood's teares, Hewson's last, Desborough's cart, met together at Hangmans-fayre. With their neck-verses, and severall discourses thereon.

notesStmt.note: A satire in the form of a dialogue; includes some verse.
Annotation on Thomason copy: "Aug: 28"; to the right of imprint date a pyramid shape with a vertical line rising from its base.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
